app_head_title: BNB48 Club® | DAO on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC)
app_og_description: BNB48 Club® was founded in the spring of 2018 by a diverse and tight-knit group of investors with a common passion for BNB. We now have over 500 club members with various backgrounds hailing from all over the world. BNB48 Club® is run as a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) and its main areas of operations and expertise are industry research, angel investment, product development, community development and management, and technical operations and maintenance.
home_page_banner_section_title_2: DAO on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC)
home_page_banner_section_subtitle_1: BNB48 Club® was founded in the spring of 2018 by a diverse and tight-knit group of investors with a common passion for BNB. We now have over 500 club members with various backgrounds hailing from all over the world. BNB48 Club® is run as a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) and its main areas of operations and expertise are industry research, angel investment, product development, community development and management, and technical operations and maintenance.
home_page_banner_section_subtitle_2: Disclaimer: BNB48 Club® is a member of the BNB community, whereas Binance is the issuer of BNB. BNB48 Club® is not affiliated with Binance in any way, shape, or form.
home_page_activity_section_content_1: BNB48 Club® actively participates in node construction in Binance Smart Chain (BSC) and Cosmos ecosystems. The BNB48 node is currently Kava’s 21st largest node, and the club has future plans to build and run nodes on BSC, the Swingby network, and more.
home_page_activity_section_content_2: The club maintains a treasury fund to finance its daily operations and projects. These projects include angel investments, project incubation, yield farming, secondary market operations, and more. Club members receive regular updates on the Treasury’s status and asset details.
home_page_introduction_section_title: Koge - BNB48 Club®’s Native Governance Token and the Core of its Ecosystem
home_page_introduction_section_subtitle: Koge is a token minted and issued by BNB48 Club®. It represents the voting power to participate in BNB48 Club®’s open governance. The club’s dividends are also paid out to members in Koge tokens.
governance_page_banner_section_title_1: The Club Council is the executive branch of BNB48 Club® overseeing all club operations, and is fully accountable to all Koge holders.
governance_page_banner_section_title_2: In BNB48’s governance structure, Koge holders submit proposals and these proposals are publicly voted on by club members. The quorum is 5% of all Koge tokens, i.e. a proposal will go through the voting process if over 5% of all Koge tokens support it.
governance_page_banner_section_title_3: Simple majority vote is the voting method of choice. 1 Koge equates to 1 vote and there are 4 voting options for each Koge token when casting its vote: Yes, No, NoWithVeto, and Abstain. The proposal passes if the all of the following requirements are met:
governance_page_banner_section_title_3_i: · The number of valid votes exceed 20% of the total Koge token supply%
· The number of Yes votes exceeds the number of No votes
· The number of NoWithVeto votes does not exceed 1/3rd of the number of valid votes
governance_page_case_section_content_1: Before the full implementation of on-chain governance on BSC, BNB48 Club® provides a tentative off-chain governance mechanism via Telegram bots.
governance_page_case_section_content_2: BNB48 Club® aims to implement on-chain governance on BSC.
governance_page_case_section_content_3: The Club Committee answers to the Koge community. The addition and removal of councilors are subject to proposals and voting.
app_footer_item_wechat_subtitle_1: 讨论币安宝、存币生息、质押借币、LaunchPad、投票上币等
app_footer_item_wechat_subtitle_2: 讨论现货/衍生品交易，参加交易活动等
app_footer_item_wechat_subtitle_3: 讨论法币交易、C2C交易等。有币安C2C商户入驻
app_footer_item_wechat_subtitle_4: 讨论币安智能链治理节点运维、BNB 质押、智能合约开发与迁移等
app_footer_item_wechat_subtitle_5: 讨论BNB48Club Kava 治理节点、质押及与Kava相关的其他话题
